Activity: Coffee, emails, Browse through some game development forums to see what's new in the industry and learn from other artists.
Continue working on the animation library. Refine the walking, running, and jumping animations. Add more variety to the animations by creating different speeds and styles. Save backup.
Begin working on combat animations. Block out basic attacks, dodges, and blocking animations. Use reference videos of martial arts or sword fighting to get the movements right.
Refine the combat animations. Ensure the attacks have impact and the dodges and blocks are believable. Focus on creating a sense of weight and power in the animations.
Start working on interaction animations. Block out animations for picking up objects, opening doors, and interacting with other characters. Ensure the animations are smooth and seamless.
Wrap up for the day. Save and backup all the work. Check emails.
